Text: portfolioJohn Another person that should be included in the portfolio services arrangement is Teresa Bushman legal Scott

PortfolioJohn I feel that the people needed to manage the portfolio under a services agreement are Jesus Melendrez Craig Fox engineering Arvel Martin operations and Joe Joyce land Greg Smith Geophysics may also be needed for a period of time to manage through Bonne Terre and Cypress Some analytical support may also be required John House andor Brian Otis Jesus would need to make that call Scott

Mariner Board SeatJohn I am ok with Gorte being on the board of Mariner I agree that he is reasonable He and I have always been able to work out differences of opinion I will get with Teresa to work out the process Scott

John Attached is the outline for Mariner to manage the ECR assets It assumes that the VPP assets are not included If the VPP assets are included then Joan Quick needs to be a part of the team Mariner Managementdoc Mariner Managementdoc

MarinerJohn Attached for your review is the process that I am pursuing at Mariner I would like to discuss it with you tomorrow if you are available in person or by phone Also it appears that Mariner has another discovery in its Swordfish prospect The results from the st well are positive and we are preparing to drill the nd well in the next few days Second well will be down around Christmas A definitive economic impact is impossible to provide at this point but could be in the million range Scott Restructure doc Restructure doc

Mariner ProgressGreg I know that you have more challeging issues than Mariner to consume your time however I wanted to advise you that I believe that we have at least made some short term gains at the company First we have reduced the workforce by about I will know before year end if further reductions are needed Second we have sold of Mariners interest in Aconcagua for million Originally Mariner intended to sell of its interest Expectations were million Allan brought in the buyer Nippon Third we participated in a new Shelf prospect Roaring Fork that appears to have discovered million barrels of oil Mariner has a interest Allan brought in this opportunity also Fourth we have the Basin Exploration team under contract however we potentially lose them if they do not become employees by year end We have received kudos from Industry for getting them under contract We are working on the termination of the Overriding Royalty Interest program for Management Also the budget is being developed and a new strategy for Mariner is ready for recommendation All of the above has been discussed with Lavorato He has been very supportive of our efforts Naturally we are wondering how the events at Enron could affect the future activities of Mariner but we are managing the business irrespective of the Enron situation I was pleased to learn that you will be in the top management of Dynegy however I would much prefer that you were at the top of Enron Regards Scott Josey
